meaningMnemonic: When you do <kanji>not</kanji> have <kanji>chastity</kanji>, it's probably because you were <vocabulary>unfaithful</vocabulary> to your promise to whoever you told you'd stay chaste to.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
